posts.post_content: Looking for UNSIGNED Perez Steele postcards from the regular HOF set (Not Great moments, Celbration or masterworks). Please let me know what you have,(Private message me or post here) thanks

I have an unsigned set (1-14, missing series 15).  


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
I have a stack of 68 postcards from the 1-8 Series.

I do not have any cards but I do have an entire empty box set (all the boxes that the cards originally came in), if you are interested.

Thanks!

Mike

I have multiple uncut sheets of Perez Steele's.  A variety of series and some with Dick Perez's notes written on them as to what needs to be changed.
If your interested, I'll shoot over photos.

Bob
